CustomField.description: MRR and MRR from products must match to set opportunity to stage 'Closed Won'. Check that the contract start date has been set.
CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Type,"Existing Business-Professional Services"),IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150P000005PRdt","YES"), IF( ROUND(MRR_from_Products__c,2) = Round(MRR__c,2), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150P000005PRdt","YES"), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150P000005PRcW", "NO")) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Green: Okay Red: MRR does not match MRR from Products
CustomField.label: Check - MRR matches MRR from products
